message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.buildbattle.handlers.sign.ArenaSign'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.buildbattle.handlers.sign.ArenaSign'.
Import statement for 'plugily.projects.buildbattle.handlers.setup.SetupInventory.isOptionDone' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
